name: Busy Mind
description:
Control the emoji ball to retrieve its lost limbs and roll, jump, and dash your way to the send button in this short physics platformer, all while v i b i n g to some chill beats.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

By Ben Kurtin, for the VimJam 2020: Collectables.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

Submit any bugs found in the comments below!
